x y

| 4 |  | hlhildrng.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) = ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_erngdv | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) e. DivRing ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) e. DivRing ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) = ( Base ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) = ( Base ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) |

| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) = ( +g ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) |

| 13 | 12 | #P_oveqdr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. ( Base ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) /\ y e. ( Base ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` R ) y ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .r ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) = ( .r ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 5, 2, 4, 3, 14 | #P_hlhilsmul | |- ( ph -> ( .r ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) = ( .r ` R ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_oveqdr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. ( Base ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) /\ y e. ( Base ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) ) ) -> ( x ( .r ` ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) ) y ) = ( x ( .r ` R ) y ) ) |
| 17 | 8, 10, 13, 16 | #P_drngpropd | |- ( ph -> ( ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) e. DivRing <-> R e. DivRing ) ) |
